member.name: M:Get_A_Taxi.Web.Areas.Operator.Controllers.MainController.CreateOrder(Get_A_Taxi.Web.Areas.Operator.ViewModels.OrderInputVM)
member.summary: Create a phone order, added by the operator. OperatorOrders stores the current orders added by the operators. If client phone is not found in the database, a new user account is created using the new phone number. Last order with same orderId and operator ID and the user comment are updated in OperatorOrders.
member.param: Input ViewModel of a phone order
member.returns: Partial view with phone order input form

member.summary: Subscribe for tracking assigned order's taxi and client locations There are up to to group members - the taxi and the client A group is formed, named after the order's ID Used by the taxi driver to track the client if client has enabled tracking and by the client to track taxi's position on the map

member.name: M:Get_A_Taxi.Web.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types.
